# Ntickets

```{r}
res1 <- ntickets(N = 400, gamma = 0.02, p = 0.95)
res1


```

# myboot2

```{r}

set.seed(10)
sample_data <- rnorm(20, mean = 5, sd = 2)
res2 <- myboot2(x = sample_data, fun = mean)
res2$ci
res2$pte
hist(res2$xstat)
```

# mycltb

```{r}

mycltb(n = 5, iter = 1000, p = 0.3)

```


# scatterhist

```{r}

x <- rnorm(50)
y <- rnorm(50, mean = 2)
scatterhist(x, y, xlab = "X values", ylab = "Y values")

```
